mutants.code:
def split_by_value(k, elements):
    less_than_k = [x for x in elements if x < k]
    not_less_than_k = [x for x in elements if x >= k]
    return less_than_k - not_less_than_k

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    less_than_k = [x for x in elements if x < k]
    not_less_than_k = [x for x in elements if x >= k]
    return less_than_k * not_less_than_k
